oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-12-10 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 10, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Jim Reeves (host/performer), guest performers the Louvin Brothers, and regular performers Archie Campbell, June Carter, the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Hank Garland, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1105th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Archie Campbell; Ray Price; Louvin Brothers; Del Wood; Jim Reeves
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Jim Reeves introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Jim Reeves, Archie Campbell) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Ray Price) (recording) -- Jim Reeves introduces the Louvin Brothers -- Love Is A Lonely Street (Louvin Brothers) -- Grant Turner introduces Del Wood -- New Maple Leaf Rag (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner introduces Jim Reeves -- I Missed Me (Jim Reeves) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Jim Reeves) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Garland, Hank, 1930-2004; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Reeves, Jim; Louvin Brothers; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011; Louvin, Ira, 1924-1965; Price, Ray, 1926-2013
